vote.text: Amendment SA 4977 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4977 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Rubio. (consideration: CR S5185-5186; text: CR S5185-5186) To amend the preamble.
